updates.description: This update contains bug fixes and improvements.
updates.content:
• Fixed Deadlock after completing "Tips" section
• Restructured Bug information layout (Dates FTW!)
• Removed unnecessary code lines (still doesn't reduce size that much)
• Added option to remove all website data
• Background Image in Bug view (Open, Closed and Archived; only visible when no bugs are loaded
updates.instructions: This update is recommended to all users of Bug Reporter⁷.

updates.content: This is the initial release of dstayton clicker that comes with every fresh installation.
updates.instructions: This update is recommended to all users of dstayton clicker.
